translations: 正当理由，合理解释；证明为正当，辩护；齐行，整版；（上帝眼中的）称义

sentences.sentence: His justification for the merger was just hot air.
sentences.translation: 他提出的合并理由只是连篇空话。

sentences.sentence: All I can say in justification of her actions is that she was under a lot of pressure at work.
sentences.translation: 我唯一能为她的行为辩解的理由是她工作压力很大。

sentences.sentence: Reverse spelling (crumb for crum, a word in which b has no justification) is also a trivial mistake.
sentences.translation: 反向拼写（crum 拼成 crumb，b在这里没有理由存在）也是微不足道的错误。
